text: Aibek Bokoyev (4 January 1982https://www.national-football- teams.com/player/15843/Aybek_Bokoyev.htmlSome sources said incorrect DOB 19 June 1978) is a retired Kyrgyzstani footballer, who was a striker. He played for numerous clubs in his native country, including Abdish-Ata Kant and Dordoi-Dynamo Naryn. He was a member and a captain of the Kyrgyzstan national football team. ==International Career Stats== ===Goals for Senior National Team=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
